title: Replay and Download Inquery
body:
So far I've seen that I can download, watch, and record replays by saving them as a webm format to play on my browser.  However, I can't make any use of the files I gain. Its great for reviewing vods and learning, but for content creation it seems limited.

1. Is there a way I can physically download the entirety of my game with one click? Or do I have to record the entire thing manually? I've tried recording the game with 8x speed and... it produces an 8x speed video. 
2. I know can use an online converter, but is there a direct method that will allow me to download the file as .mp4 or any editable video format?

replies.body:
The replay system is still being fleshed out so there's still a few features that are being worked on. [**This replay faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248) has some helpful tips and info, but I don't believe there's a way for you to grab a replay of an entire game without first recording it. 

If you're looking into content creation like youtube vids, you may want to look into another program like [**OBS **](https://obsproject.com/)or Gameshow to record your games.
